meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.1 ::date 2012-12-18T07:11:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt If you 're Arlington County , you create a new vision for the boxy buildings and subterranean passageways in Crystal City that will be emptied by the federal Base Realignment and Closure Commission . # ::save-date Fri Feb 5, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0007_1.txt
sentence: If you 're Arlington County , you create a new vision for the boxy buildings and subterranean passageways in Crystal City that will be emptied by the federal Base Realignment and Closure Commission .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.2 ::date 2012-12-19T18:34:47 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt In place of the sterile monoculture that now characterizes the office complex near the Pentagon , members of an advisory task force see a more lively street - level scene with a greater mix of shops , restaurants and offices . # ::save-date Tue Oct 24, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0007_2.txt
sentence: In place of the sterile monoculture that now characterizes the office complex near the Pentagon , members of an advisory task force see a more lively street - level scene with a greater mix of shops , restaurants and offices .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.3 ::date 2012-12-19T18:38:41 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Writes WaPo reporter Annie Gowen : # ::save-date Thu Apr 17, 2014 ::file wb_eng_0007_3.txt

::id wb.eng_0007.4 ::date 2012-12-19T19:25:22 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt [ Board of Supervisors Chairman Chris ] Zimmerman and others speaking yesterday said that the vounty sees the empty space as an opportunity to `` reimagine '' and `` brand '' Crystal City as an attractive destination . # ::save-date Sun Jul 26, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0007_4.txt
sentence: [ Board of Supervisors Chairman Chris ] Zimmerman and others speaking yesterday said that the vounty sees the empty space as an opportunity to `` reimagine '' and `` brand '' Crystal City as an attractive destination .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.5 ::date 2012-12-19T19:29:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Though close to Reagan National Airport and dense with hotels , the area has long been seen as a gloomy 1960s era enclave of offices connected by underground passages . # ::save-date Wed Jun 17, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0007_5.txt
sentence: Though close to Reagan National Airport and dense with hotels , the area has long been seen as a gloomy 1960s era enclave of offices connected by underground passages .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.6 ::date 2012-12-19T19:34:13 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt But parts of Crystal City have lately seen a rebirth , thanks to an influx of trendy cafes and a new streetscape .... # ::save-date Fri Feb 5, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0007_6.txt
sentence: But parts of Crystal City have lately seen a rebirth , thanks to an influx of trendy cafes and a new streetscape ....

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.7 ::date 2012-12-19T19:37:57 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Charles E. Smith Commercial Realty , which owns 7.4 million of the 11 million square feet of office space in the neighborhood , has spent $ 40 million on improvements to enliven the streets and attract new businesses . # ::save-date Wed Sep 21, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0007_7.txt
sentence: Charles E. Smith Commercial Realty , which owns 7.4 million of the 11 million square feet of office space in the neighborhood , has spent $ 40 million on improvements to enliven the streets and attract new businesses .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.8 ::date 2012-12-19T19:46:20 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt It turned Crystal Drive into a two - way main street and has recruited new shops and chic restaurants such as Jaleo and McCormick & Schmick 's . # ::save-date Fri Feb 5, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0007_8.txt
sentence: It turned Crystal Drive into a two - way main street and has recruited new shops and chic restaurants such as Jaleo and McCormick & Schmick 's .

sentence: Reading between the lines of Gowen 's story , however , there seems to be one big missing piece :

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.10 ::date 2012-12-20T19:28:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Housing . # ::save-date Thu Dec 20, 2012 ::file wb_eng_0007_10.txt

::id wb.eng_0007.11 ::date 2012-12-20T19:28:53 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Creating a livelier commercial district is a worthy goal . # ::save-date Tue Oct 24, 2017 ::file wb_eng_0007_11.txt
sentence: Creating a livelier commercial district is a worthy goal .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.12 ::date 2012-12-20T19:30:03 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt But creating a balanced community with a mix of housing , offices , shopping and other amenities -- allowing people to live close to where they work and play -- is an even more worthy goal . # ::save-date Tue Jan 2, 2018 ::file wb_eng_0007_12.txt
sentence: But creating a balanced community with a mix of housing , offices , shopping and other amenities -- allowing people to live close to where they work and play -- is an even more worthy goal .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.13 ::date 2012-12-20T19:36:09 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt As Ed Risse has pointed out , the relocation of 17,000 jobs creates a rare opportunity to create a genuine balanced communities in Northern Virginia . # ::save-date Fri Jul 31, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0007_13.txt
sentence: As Ed Risse has pointed out , the relocation of 17,000 jobs creates a rare opportunity to create a genuine balanced communities in Northern Virginia .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.14 ::date 2012-12-20T19:40:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The problem , I surmise -- it 's not discussed in the story -- is that Arlington is concerned about protecting its tax base , which means replacing the vacated offices with new offices , not housing . # ::save-date Fri Feb 5, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0007_14.txt
sentence: The problem , I surmise -- it 's not discussed in the story -- is that Arlington is concerned about protecting its tax base , which means replacing the vacated offices with new offices , not housing .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.15 ::date 2012-12-20T19:44:15 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt It 's hard to fault Arlington for pursuing its short - term self interest . # ::save-date Thu Feb 4, 2016 ::file wb_eng_0007_15.txt
sentence: It 's hard to fault Arlington for pursuing its short - term self interest .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.16 ::date 2012-12-20T19:44:46 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt But everyone needs to recognize that Arlington 's decision not to pursue a balanced community means that housing will end up somewhere else , presumably in outlying counties . # ::save-date Fri Mar 13, 2015 ::file wb_eng_0007_16.txt
sentence: But everyone needs to recognize that Arlington 's decision not to pursue a balanced community means that housing will end up somewhere else , presumably in outlying counties .

meta_info: ::id wb.eng_0007.17 ::date 2012-12-20T20:11:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt And employees working in the buffed up Crystal City will wind up commuting long distances and clogging Northern Virginia thoroughfares . # ::save-date Wed Jan 17, 2018 ::file wb_eng_0007_17.txt
sentence: And employees working in the buffed up Crystal City will wind up commuting long distances and clogging Northern Virginia thoroughfares .
